collections.title: Educators and Trainers Prompts
collections.description: ChatGPT prompts for educators and trainers

promptTemplates.title: Lesson Plan Development
promptTemplates.content: Develop a lesson plan for teaching {subject} to {student_age_group}.

promptTemplates.title: Interactive Exercise Design
promptTemplates.content: Create an interactive exercise to teach {skill_or_concept} in a {learning_environment}.

promptTemplates.title: Educational Content Summary
promptTemplates.content: Summarize the key points of {educational_material} for a {target_audience}.
